catalog.name: Average annual wind speed
catalog.description:
This collection contains wind speed maps expressed in m/s calculated as an annual average over 30 years of data at different heights.
In particular, these elaborations derive from the new Italian anemological database consisting of 30 years of data with an hourly and spatial time step of 1.4 km, using the Weather Research and Forecasting (WRF) meteorological model combined with a statistical post-processing based on Analog Ensemble (AnEn).

members.name: Speed ​​Onshore
members.description: This collection includes maps of average onshore wind speed (m/s) at heights of 50, 75, 100, 125 and 150 m a.g.l.
